postListing.pattern: Paginated or infinite scroll post list

aiSuggestions.context: You are helping create a blog/content website. Common patterns include: markdown-based content with frontmatter, post listing with pagination, individual post pages, RSS feed generation, search functionality, tag/category filtering, comment system, author pages, archive pages. SEO is important - use proper meta tags, semantic HTML, structured data. Performance matters - static site generation, image optimization, lazy loading. Content management can be static (markdown files) or dynamic (CMS).

codeExamples.description: Add SEO meta tags to posts
codeExamples.code:
<head>
  <title>{post.title} | My Blog</title>
  <meta name="description" content={post.excerpt} />
  <meta property="og:title" content={post.title} />
  <meta property="og:description" content={post.excerpt} />
</head>

commonBugs: Missing SEO meta tags - Always include title, description, Open Graph tags
Images not optimized - Compress and use appropriate formats
No RSS feed - Important for content syndication
Missing pagination - Can cause performance issues with many posts
Search not working - Implement proper search functionality
Markdown not rendering - Use proper markdown parser
Date formatting issues - Use consistent date format
Missing 404 page - Always handle missing posts gracefully
performanceTips: Use static site generation (SSG) for better performance
Optimize images - Use WebP, lazy loading, responsive images
Implement code splitting for blog posts
Cache post data - Use service workers or CDN
Minimize JavaScript - Only load what's needed
Use a CDN for static assets

bestPractices.content: Use markdown for posts, frontmatter for metadata
bestPractices.seo: Proper meta tags, semantic HTML, structured data
